dict.string: on alfred_script(query) set jira to "./jira.sh " set growlTitle to "JIRA" set errorTitle to "JIRA Error" # Command Hashes set logWork to {"l", "log", "work"} set comment to {"c", "comment"} set h to {"help", "?"} set theWords to my split(item 1 of query, space) set command to item 1 of theWords set wordCount to count of theWords set invalidParams to false # Comment on an issue. # Usage: jira comment ISSUE-4 my comment if command is in comment then try if wordCount > 1 then set issueKey to item 2 of theWords else set invalidParams to true set scriptResult to "Please provide an issue key" end if if wordCount > 2 then set comment to my join(items 3 through wordCount of theWords, space) set scriptResult to do shell script jira & "--action addComment --issue " & issueKey & " --comment " & quote & comment & quote else if wordCount = 2 then set invalidParams to true set scriptResult to "Please provide a comment" end if on error errMsg set scriptResult to "Error: " & errMsg end try if scriptResult contains "error" or invalidParams is true then set theTitle to growlTitle else set theTitle to growlTitle & space & issueKey end if my growl(theTitle, scriptResult) # Log work on an issue. # Usage: log ISSUE-4 my comment #3h 40" else if command is in logWork then try set hashSplit to my split(item 1 of query, "#") if (count of hashSplit) is not 2 then set invalidParams to true set scriptResult to "Please provide your time spent, eg. #1h 30m" else set timeSpent to item 2 of hashSplit end if set issueComment to my split(item 1 of hashSplit, space) set thatCount to count of issueComment if thatCount > 1 then set issueKey to item 2 of issueComment else set invalidParams to true set scriptResult to "Please provide an issue key" end if if thatCount > 2 then set comment to my join(items 3 through thatCount of issueComment, space) else if thatCount = 2 then set invalidParams to true set scriptResult to "Please provide a comment" end if if invalidParams is not true then set scriptResult to do shell script jira & " --action addWork --issue " & issueKey & " --timeSpent " & quote & timeSpent & quote & " --comment " & quote & comment & quote end if on error errMsg set scriptResult to "Error: " & errMsg end try my growl(growlTitle, scriptResult) # Help else if command is in h then open location "https://github.com/devault-gmbh/JIRAlfred/blob/master/README.md" else my growl(growlTitle, "Say what? I didn't got that command!") end if end alfred_script # Helpers on growl(theTitle, theDescription) tell application "System Events" to set GrowlRunning to exists application process "GrowlHelperApp" if GrowlRunning then tell application "GrowlHelperApp" set the allNotificationsList to {"AlfredExt-Jira"} set the enabledNotificationsList to {"AlfredExt-Jira"} register as application ¬ "AlfredExt-Jira" all notifications allNotificationsList ¬ default notifications enabledNotificationsList ¬ icon of application "Alfred" notify with name ¬ "AlfredExt-Jira" title ¬ theTitle description ¬ theDescription application name "AlfredExt-Jira" end tell end if end growl to join(aList, delimiter) set retVal to "" set prevDelimiter to AppleScript's text item delimiters set AppleScript's text item delimiters to delimiter set retVal to aList as string set AppleScript's text item delimiters to prevDelimiter return retVal end join to split(aString, delimiter) set retVal to {} set prevDelimiter to AppleScript's text item delimiters log delimiter set AppleScript's text item delimiters to {delimiter} set retVal to every text item of aString set AppleScript's text item delimiters to prevDelimiter return retVal end split to trim(someText) repeat until someText does not start with " " set someText to text 2 thru -1 of someText end repeat repeat until someText does not end with " " set someText to text 1 thru -2 of someText end repeat return someText end trim
